Headline: #126 Jackson buses Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
